metadata.name: The Circus
metadata.description: For time travelling thief Kora Langley, stealing antiquities is a walk in the park: get in, bag the goods, get out. Simple. However, lately her boss has been sending her on more hazardous assignments - we’re talking life threatening here, people! Why is he putting her in danger?  What’s with that stone tablet collection? And could Kora’s final job be her, you know... final everything?
